cause.description:
For the past 5 years members of the Newbury Park High School Class of 2002 have been donating their time and money to support the efforts local NPHS graduates through an annual scholarship. The scholarship was founded by 4 NPHS friends and rewards accomplishment in the 4 areas they found most important in their high school careers: Academics, Athletics, Community Service, and Leadership.
1. Hard working students deserve recognition.
2. Academics, Athletics, Community Serivce, and Leadership are important aspects of the high school career.
3. Consistent involvement is preferred to sporatic or temporary involvement.
cause.mission: Provide recognition and reward for hard working NPHS graduates.
cause.name: NPHS 2002 Alumni Scholarship
